events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I need to return it.
The customer reported wanting a refund and return for an unwanted product, assigning cluster Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please confirm the reason for your return and whether the product is unopened or used.
My order number is 789654123. The product arrived sealed but I changed my mind about the purchase and want to return it.
Thank you for the info. You are eligible for a full refund as the product is unopened. Please ship it back using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the product back today and look forward to the refund.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the product, we will process your refund immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have shipped the product back and to offer any further assistance if needed.
Yes, I shipped the product yesterday via the prepaid label you provided. Thank you for your support.
We have received the returned product and completed your refund today. The money should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a short survey to your email to hear your feedback about your refund and overall experience with our service.
The customer completed the survey, indicating high satisfaction with the refund process and support received.
The case has been formally closed after confirming the refund completion and receiving positive survey feedback.
